__prompts__.module_name: module_name (recommended: press enter to use the default module name)
__prompts__.github_username: Github organization or profile name, default: foo
__prompts__.include_action: Include NOMAD Actions (NEW in nomad-lab v1.4+)
__prompts__.include_north_tools: Include NOMAD North Tools (NEW in nomad-lab v1.4+)
__prompts__.north_tool_name: Name of the NORTH tool to be displayed in the list of NOMAD NORTH tools. For include_north_tools == n, this will be ignored.
